name: Cueist 2
summary: Cueist 2 is the long-awaited sequel to the the original hit pool and snooker game for iOS. Play against a friend or challenge one of the CPU controlled players of increasing skill. Customizable tables, 8 selectable physics models (some serious, some not so much) and a wealth of opponents make this the perfect way to have a relaxing game of pool on your mobile device.
